criteria.justification: The meeting effectively addressed the main objectives set out at the beginning.
Most participants contributed actively, though a few remained disengaged.
Information was presented clearly, but some technical jargon could confuse non-experts.
The meeting ran over time, indicating some discussions were lengthy.

strengths: Clear and practical demonstration of the system.
areas_for_improvement: Some discussions could have been more objective.
Time management needs to be improved to stick to the agenda.
